about_the_game:
You feel drowsy... Take one last look at your device, and then—

Pixels everywhere!

You are trapped in a dungeon, forced to battle in deadly arenas!

Brace yourself and fight your way through intense battles, ruthless enemies, and ever-changing challenges.

Win thrilling matches, gather resources, craft powerful gear, buy and equip the best weapons, and master your combat skills—

All to prepare for the ultimate showdown against the final boss!

  • Beautifully animated pixel art with smooth 8-directional movement.

  • Real-time action RPG gameplay that keeps you on your toes.

  • A wide variety of challenging enemies to test your skills.

  • Multiple arenas to battle in, each with unique layouts and designs.

  • Diverse game modes to suit different playstyles and keep things fresh.

  • Discover and utilize a wealth of objects and items to gain the edge.

  • Wield an arsenal of powerful weapons and unleash devastating abilities.

  • Unlock and strategize with passive abilities and game-changing superpowers.

  • Cutscenes in the form of pixel art comics that bring the story to life.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Because of the pixel-art style the game contains no realistic depictions of violence.

But 
- The player will have to fight enemies.
- Fighters can get hurt and die in this game.
- The story could be considerd scary.
- Some graphics could be considered scary.
